title: Player Unknown's Battlegrounds: PUBG Mobile
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced battle royale game where players fight for survival, strategy, and victory on dynamic maps.

title: Genshin Impact
description: An open-world fantasy action RPG where you explore the vast land of Teyvat, battle, solve puzzles, and unlock characters using a gacha system.

title: Candy Crush Saga
description: Match and blast colorful candies to progress through thousands of sweet levels, using boosters and clever moves.

title: Subway Surfers
description: Run, dodge trains, and collect coins in this fast-paced, infinite runner game set in a vibrant urban world.

title: Clash of Clans
description: Build your village, raise an army, and battle in epic clan wars in this popular strategy game.

title: Call of Duty: Mobile
description: Classic Call of Duty action on mobile – multiplayer, battle royale, and ranked play with iconic maps and weapons.

title: Among Us
description: Work together with crewmates to complete tasks — but beware, impostors lurk among you!

title: Lords Mobile
description: Build a powerful empire, recruit heroes, and battle players around the world in this real-time strategy MMO.

title: Royal Match
description: Match cubes and help King Robert restore his castle in this colorful match-3 puzzle adventure.

title: Fire Emblem Heroes
description: Assemble teams of Fire Emblem characters and battle in tactical, turn-based combat to save the realm.

title: Gardenscapes: New Acres
description: Restore and decorate a garden by solving match-3 puzzles and discovering its hidden stories.

title: Puzzle & Dragons
description: Combine match-3 puzzle gameplay with monster collection and RPG mechanics in an addictive hybrid game.

title: Temple Run 2
description: Run for your life through perilous cliffs, zip lines, mines and jungles in this sequel to the hit endless runner.

title: 8 Ball Pool
description: Play pool with friends or solo in this popular online 8-ball billiards game.

title: Roblox
description: Create, play, and explore millions of immersive 3D experiences built by a global community of creators.

title: Hill Climb Racing
description: Drive uphill in this physics-based racing game — upgrade your vehicle and try to beat your best distance.

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
description: 5v5 MOBA on mobile — choose your hero, team up, and battle in real-time strategic matches.

title: Clash Royale
description: Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring Clash of Clans characters, and duel players in real-time.

title: Brawl Stars
description: Fast-paced 3v3 or battle royale matches where you choose from a variety of brawlers with unique skills.

title: Pokémon GO
description: Explore the real world, catch Pokémon, battle in gyms, and team up with friends in this augmented reality adventure.

title: Subnautica: Below Zero
description: Explore icy underwater biomes on an alien planet, survive varied environments, and uncover the mysteries of the deep.

title: Asphalt 9: Legends
description: Race with exotic cars in high-speed arcade-style tracks with stunning graphics and real-time multiplayer.

title: Clash of Lords
description: Build your army, defend your base, and go to war in this strategic mobile empire-building game.

title: CSR Racing 2
description: Drag race with real supercars — customize, upgrade and compete in fast-paced multiplayer races.

title: Hay Day
description: Manage your farm, grow crops, raise animals, and trade goods with your neighbors.

title: Rise of Kingdoms
description: Command a civilization, fight historic battles, and expand your kingdom in this real-time strategy game.

title: AFK Arena
description: Collect heroes, set them in battle formations, and progress through the game even while you’re away.

title: State of Survival
description: A post-apocalyptic survival MMO where you build a base, team up with allies, and fight off zombies.

title: Marvel Contest of Champions
description: Battle as iconic Marvel heroes and villains in 3D arenas. Fight in solo mode or against other players.

title: Subway Princess Runner
description: Run through subway tracks as a princess — dodge obstacles, collect coins and unlock new characters.
